cofh.lib.util.helpers

Class FireworksHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • cofh.lib.util.helpers.FireworksHelper

  • public final class FireworksHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains helper functions to assist with working with fireworks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FireworksHelper.Explosion
      Represents a single explosion that a firework rocket can contain.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      FireworksHelper()

      • FireworksHelper

        public FireworksHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • getFireworksStack

        public static ItemStack getFireworksStack(int flightDuration,
                          FireworksHelper.Explosion... explosions)
        Creates a fireworks ItemStack, with the resulting fireworks having a certain flight duration and a variety of FireworksHelper.Explosions.
        Parameters:
        flightDuration - The flight duration of the fireworks. Possible range is between 0 (inclusive) and 3 (inclusive).
        explosions - The explosions that will occur when the fireworks detonate.
        Returns:
        A fireworks ItemStack.

      • getRandomFireworks

        public static ItemStack getRandomFireworks(int flightDuration,
                           int explosions,
                           int primaryColors,
                           int fadeColors)
        Creates a randomized fireworks ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        flightDuration - The flight duration of the fireworks. Possible range is between 0 (inclusive) and 3 (inclusive).
        explosions - The amount of FireworksHelper.Explosions that will occur when the fireworks detonate.
        primaryColors - The amount of different primary colors that each Explosion will have.
        fadeColors - The amount of different fade colors that each Explosion will have.
        Returns:
        A randomized fireworks ItemStack.
